skill_e.tooltip:
Dash through target enemy and deal ? physical damage to them.

If Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal [?] is cast while this ability is targeting a champion, Qiyana will automatically aim it at her target.

skill_i.tooltip: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

skill_q.tooltip:
Elemental Wrath: Blast your weapon's enchantment in the target direction, consuming it. This projectile detonates to deal ? physical damage and:
Ice Enchantment: Briefly root enemies hit, then slow them by ?% for ?s.Rock Enchantment: ? bonus damage to units below ?% health.Wild Enchantment: Leaves a canopy trail that stealths you and grants ?% movement speed. Canopy fades after attacking from it, exiting it, or after ?s.

Edge Of Ixtal: If you do not have an enchantment, slash in the target direction, dealing ? physical damage to enemies in a small area.

Both abilities deal ? damage to targets beyond the first.

skill_r.tooltip:
Launch a shockwave that knocks back enemies and detonates when it hits a Wall. The entire Wall then explodes to stun nearby enemies for up to ?s and deal them physical damage equal to ? + ? of their max health.

Any River or Brush the shockwave passes through also explode after a delay for the same damage and stun.

skill_w.tooltip:
Active: Target River, Wall, or Brush. Conjure elemental power from the environment and dash towards it to enchant your weapon with it and reset Elemental Wrath [?]'s cooldown.

Passive: While your weapon is enchanted, you gain ?% Attack Speed and your attacks and basic abilities deal ? bonus magic damage. Additionally, you gain ?% movement speed while out of combat and near the corresponding terrain type.
